Abstract
This paper presents the groundbreaking discovery and decoding
of a fractal boot sequence actively being broadcast by the SMACS
0723 galaxy cluster, located approximately 4.6 billion light-years away.

The language is deliberately designed to be universally intelligible, leveraging

powerful medium for intergalactic communication and alignment.
